STATEMENT OF THE AUDITOR OF PUBLIC ACCOUNTS.
State of Nebraska,
I
Office of the Auditor of Public Accounts. >
It is hereby certified that the foregoing are true statements of the appropriations made and the moneys expended by the Twenty-Seventh Session of the Legislature of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the 16th of May, 1901, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid as provided by Section 22, Article III, of the Constitution.
In testimony whereof, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my official seal, this 16th day of May, 1901.
CHARLES WESTON,
[seal] Auditor of Public Accounts.
